title: SFEC Departmental Gifts Disclosure List of Gifts
description: A. SUMMARY Section 3.217 of the Campaign and Governmental Conduct Code requires each Department Head to disclose payments that their department receives from a source that is not a federal, state, or local government and for which the department does not provide equal or greater consideration. Each department accepting gifts will disclose all gifts received during the calendar month from a source that is not a federal, state, or local government. Departments will be expected to submit one disclosure form covering all gifts received in the preceding calendar month, when applicable. This dataset provides detailed information about individual gifts reported by departments, such as the gift donor name, date of gift receipt, and gift value. For more information, visit the Ethics Commission’s webpage on Gifts to city departments. B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED Data for this dataset is created when departments file the gifts disclosure form provided by the Ethics Commission, starting in December 2024. This form is due within 15 calendar days after the end of the month the department received the gift(s). If a department has not received any gifts in a given month, no filing is necessary. C. UPDATE PROCESS The dataset is updated via the Socrata Publisher API as needed when form filings are submitted and signed by city departments. D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET The unique row identifier for this dataset is “Entry Id”, which is obtained by adding an index to the “Envelope Id”. The “Filing Series” column can be used to identify the filing period (year and month) and department of each gift entry. For full context, this dataset should be joined with the Cover Page dataset by the Envelope Id column. E. RELATED DATASETS For an overview of each department filing and any amendment filings, visit the associated dataset SFEC Departmental Gifts Disclosure Cover Page. A combined view of both datasets is also available: SFEC Departmental Gifts Disclosure Joined View.

columns.name: Filing Series
columns.description: Combines filing year, month, and department name

columns.name: GiftsList ListOfGifts DescriptionOfGift
columns.description: Description of the gift. Include number of items, if applicable

columns.name: GiftsList ListOfGifts PurposeAndUse
columns.description: Description of how the gift will be used

columns.name: GiftsList ListOfGifts DepartmentContract
columns.description: Description of any contract that the donor has with department. Include the contract number.

columns.name: GiftsList ListOfGifts LicensePermitEntitlement
columns.description: Description of any license, permit, or other entitlement for use that the donor is currently seeking from department

columns.name: GiftsList ListOfGifts IssuedLicensePermitEntitlement
columns.description: Description of any license, permit, or other entitlement for use that department has issued to the donor within the last 12 months

columns.name: GiftsList ListOfGifts FinancialInterest
columns.description: Description of any other financial interests that the donor has involving the City, including contracts with other City departments

columns.name: GiftsList ListOfGifts AdditionalInformation
columns.description: Optional field for additional information about the gift

columns.name: GiftsList ListOfGifts GiftReceipients Aggregate
columns.description: Name of any City officer or employee who receives a personal benefit from the gift or through the department's use of the gift, and a description and valuation of the personal benefits

columns.name: Entry Id
columns.description: Envelope Id and gift entry number
